title: This website
description: This project to present my portfolio is a technological showcase. I developed it with my favorite framework of the moment: the latest version of Angular (8).

title: Stone Dealer
description: This is an e-commerce project, the website is no more online. It was developed for a particular to sell some precious stones in Europe. To make it simple, it was using the PayPal API to be user friendly for the payment.

title: Swift Receipt
description: This project which is still online, allows you to scan your supermarket receipt, if you have purchased products under promotional offer, you will receive coupons for other purchases

title: Dr Beckmann & Costa coffee
description: It was a limited-time project (6 months). In association with Costa Coffee, Dr. Beckmann has offered coupons for the latter if you have purchased the latest Beckmann products
